title: Virgin Islands National Park: Park Home
body: American Paradise  Virgin Islands National Parkâ€™s hills, valleys and beaches are breathtaking. However, within its 7,000 plus acres on the island of St. John is the complex history of civilizations - both free and enslaved - dating back more than a thousand years, all who utilized the land and the sea for survival.                Boating in Paradise   Boating information, best places to snorkel and more.         Step Back In Time   A Glimpse of St. John's Plantation Era.            New Concession Operator Selected   New Concession Operator Selected for Cinnamon Bay and Trunk Bay Areas of Virgin Islands National Park
